properties.Project Description: The design and construction of grade separated junctions at Junctions 15 and 16 on the A55. The project includes new slip roads and an underbridge at Llanfairfechan and a new overbridge and slip roads at Dwygyfylchi.

properties.Project Description: Using underground mine-water to warm 150 homes in Caerau Bridgend. Water in the underground mine workings of the former Caerau colliery has been naturally heated by the earth, and will be harnessed using heat pump technology and a network of pipes as a geothermal source of energy,
